room_title: Escape room "Area 51" by The Great Escape of La Crosse in La Crosse
review: A group of 8 of us went here from work for a team building event. Did the Area 51 room. We all had a great time! It was challenging and we certainly needed all 8 of us to get out. The clues they gave us obviously helped tremendously. We got out with only 29 seconds to spare! Great time!

room_title: Escape room "Area 51" by The Great Escape of La Crosse in La Crosse
review: A group of eight of us did the Area 51 room as a team-building exercise for work. It was honestly the coolest thing I have done in years. We needed all eight brains to make it out and we escaped!! Staff was so awesome and hints saved us!! I plan on going back!!
